title: Bugspat Reporter
body:
So, I just wanted to know if this Bugsplat Reporter thing is a genuine helper of some sort, or if it's just some kind of scam, because I've been getting it quite a bit recently. If anyone can also tell me how to get rid of it, I'd be very grate

http://imgur.com/6qof5Ce

replies.body:
Hey there,

The Bugsplat tool is the inbuilt crash handler for League of Legends, how often do you run into bugsplats?

Could you try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#mq6) for me, let me know if this helps resolve your issues.
Well, they aren't very often, but I never got them for so long, but the recent 3 weeks or so, got it around 3 times.
Do let me know if they continue even after a client repair.

I did the repair yesterday, so hopefully it's all good now :)

Got exams coming up, so won't be playing a lot right now (or at all)
